name: PINEAPPLE ENZYME PORE CLEARING CLEANSER
description: Cleanse and exfoliate the skin with our two-in-one, foaming-gel Pineapple Enzyme Pore Clearing Cleanser.

name: RAYS & SHINE CLEANSER
description: Gently cleanse and brighten with this sensorial antioxidant-rich jelly cleanser.

name: STRAWBERRY FACE MILK
description: A comforting drop of moisture to nurture skin. Formulated with Strawberry Seed Oil, Marshmallow, and Lotus Flower.

name: WATERMELON FACE MILK
description: A refreshing drop of moisture to balance skin. Formulated with Watermelon Seed Oil, Cucumber Water, and Aloe, this lightweight formula will replenish hydration for a healthier, softer complexion.

name: HI, BUTTER MANGO BODY BUTTER
description: We don't do dry skin. Man-go away and get butter! Enjoy softer, hydrated skin with this mango scented body butter.

name: PRISM Botanical AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial
description: A jelly-textured, concentrated blend of plant-based AHA, and Willow Bark-based BHA in an exfoliating rinse-off weekly facial that naturally helps transform skin from dull to radiant and glowing in as little as one use.

name: HEY, SUGAR PEACH BODY SCRUB
description: Sweeten up your self care with this peach body scrub. The exfoliating and deeply moisturizing ingredients will transform the way your skin feels and leave you smelling amazing.

name: SUGAR SUGAR - CHERRY
description: An intense, all natural and vegan lip scrub that cleanses, gently exfoliates, hydrates, and brightens lips.

name: PAPAYA SORBET ENZYME CLEANSING BALM
description: Reveal smooth, glowing skin from the start of your routine and effortlessly dissolve makeup, dirt, and oil with the PEG-free Papaya Sorbet Enzyme Cleansing Balm.

name: BANANA SOUFFL'E MOISTURE CREAM
description: This cream is a special bouncy souffl√© texture that comforts like a cream but has the lightness of a gel, creating the ultimate universal moisturizer.

name: SMOOTH SUGAR CLEAR KIWI FACE AND LIP SCRUB
description: Discover the 1st sugar scrub with treating actives in gentle textures for deep, yet gentle, exfoliation of the skin.

name: PINEAPPLE-C BRIGHTENING SERUM
description: A lightweight, juicy serum that retexturizer, hydrates, and soothes the skin for a luminous, glowing complexion.
